availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, tavern keeper. Native of Germany. Married to Margaret "Mary" Rush Martin. Father of Anthony "Tony" Martin, Henry "Harry" Martin, Lewis Martin, and Ellen Elizabeth "Lizzie" Martin. Married to Katherine Cawein Martin in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 10, 1858. Father of Louisa Martin. Tavernkeeper in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Tavernkeeper in Louisville in 1860. Tavernkeeper in Louisville in 1861. Tavernkeeper in Louisville in 1865.
